com.xtructure.xsim
Interface XSimulation.Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractXSimulationListener, SimToolBar
Enclosing interface:
XSimulation<F extends XTime.Phase<F>>
public static interface XSimulation.Listener

A listener to a simulation.

Method Summary
 void simulationComponentAdded(XSimulation<?> sim, XComponent<?> component)
          Notifies this listener that a component has been added to a simulation.
 void simulationComponentRemoved(XSimulation<?> sim, XComponent<?> component)
          Notifies this listener that a component has been removed from a simulation.

          Notifies this listener that a simulation's state has changed.

          Notifies this listener that a simulation's tick delay has changed.

          Notifies this listener that a simulation's time has changed.
 

Method Detail

simulationComponentAdded

void simulationComponentAdded(XSimulation<?> sim,
                              XComponent<?> component)
Notifies this listener that a component has been added to a simulation.

Parameters:
sim - the simulation to which the given component has been added
component - the component that has been added to given simulation

simulationComponentRemoved

void simulationComponentRemoved(XSimulation<?> sim,
                                XComponent<?> component)
Notifies this listener that a component has been removed from a simulation.

Parameters:
sim - the simulation from which the given component has been removed
component - the component that has been removed from given simulation

simulationTickDelayChanged

void simulationTickDelayChanged(XSimulation<?> sim,
                                int delay)
Notifies this listener that a simulation's tick delay has changed.

Parameters:
sim - the simulation, the tick delay of which has changed
delay - the new tick delay of the given simulation

simulationTimeChanged

void simulationTimeChanged(XSimulation<?> sim,
                           XTime<?> time)
Notifies this listener that a simulation's time has changed.

Parameters:
sim - the simulation, the time of which has changed
time - the new time of the given simulation

simulationStateChanged

void simulationStateChanged(XSimulation<?> sim,
                            XSimulation.SimulationState state)
Notifies this listener that a simulation's state has changed.

Parameters:
sim - the simulation, the state of which has changed
state - the new state of the given simulation
